'''End stone brick stairs''' are an [[End stone brick]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
End stone brick stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|End Stone Brick Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}
